Isha Sathsang
December, 2016
 

You cannot live tomorrow. You can only live now.

- Sadhguru

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 
Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to reconnect with your kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:

Date & Time: 3 December, 9:30 am to 11:45 am
Venue: Viva Dance, 9th floor, Dawning House, 145 Connaught Road Central, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong ( Map)

Inner engineering online participants
Please be outside the door not later than 35 minutes of start time to join the session after the Shambhavi practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the 2nd Saturday of every month across all Asia Pacific centers including Hong Kong starting from Jan 2017.

Program Schedule
 

Meet, Mingle, & Meditate with Sadhguru

This rare yet precious opportunity is available to all of us and all around us, whether seeking or not. An evening with a realised master who makes the mystical simple, approachable and accessible. Whatever it is, that is burning within you as an unanswered question, here is an opportunity to come and sit in Sadhguru's presence and realise the answers.
Date Location
21 Jan, 2017 (Sat) Malaysia
22 Jan, 2017 (Sun) Singapore
